description: This pack includes every natively supported free encoder binary for use with the Converter foobar2000 component.
post_install: if(Test-Path "$(appdir foobar2000 $global)") {if(!(Test-Path "$(appdir foobar2000 $global)\current\encoders")) { New-Item "$(appdir foobar2000 $global)\current\encoders" -ItemType Junction -Target "$dir" | Out-Null }}

if(Test-Path "$(appdir foobar2000-portable $global)") {if(!(Test-Path "$(appdir foobar2000-portable $global)\current\encoders")) { New-Item "$(appdir foobar2000-portable $global)\current\encoders" -ItemType Junction -Target  "$dir" | Out-Null }}
